programlisting: # Lists up to a specified number of groups for the account. # # @param count [Integer] The maximum number of groups to list. def list_groups(count) @iam_resource.groups.limit(count).each do |group| puts("\t#{group.name}") end rescue Aws::Errors::ServiceError => e puts("Couldn't list groups for the account. Here's why:") puts("\t#{e.code}: #{e.message}") raise end
